commit.message:
mn10300.md (movdi, movdf): 64-bit clean-up.

* config/mn10300/mn10300.md (movdi, movdf): 64-bit clean-up.
* config/mn10300/mn10300.c (print_operand): Likewise.

From-SVN: r34062

files.patch:

 	portable.
